Hours of work: 32.25 hours per week
Working pattern: Part-time, Term-time only.
(As the position is part-time/term-time only, the above salary will be pro rata)
Fixed term until: July 2019 initially, however may be extended based on nursery pupil numbers.

This role may be filled by two applicants as a job share.

Closing date: Friday 26 April 2019, noon
Interview date: Week commencing Monday 29 April 2019

For more information and to apply for the above post, please contact:

East Hoathly CE Primary School and Nursery
Church Marks Lane
East Hoathly
Lewes
East Sussex
BN8 6EQ

Phone: 01825 840247
Email: office@easthoathly.e-sussex.sch.uk
Website: http://www.easthoathlynursery.co uk

Please note, we do not accept CVs.
